lines.text: A longing for love, insatiable desire
Jesus lead me to the Father's arms
His comforting words build hope to carry on
How can I live without your gentle soothing voice?
Where can I go to know the fruits of love and joy?
Bring my heart to the point of least resistance
A place of simple trust and one of simple faith
Only you can take me to His home
Where we will be united, His promises fulfilled
